p.style: margin: 0px 0px 6px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #1d2129; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; background-color: #ffffff;

span.style: font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 18pt; color: #800000;
font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 18pt; color: #800000;

span.span:
From Mr. Eccles, North White School Corporation Superintendent: (4/9/2020)
Food Service Update:
Beginning on Monday, April 13th, our food service will only operate twice per week, on Mondays and Thursdays. On Mondays, we will provide meals for Monday, Tuesday and Wednesday. On Thursdays, we will provide meals for Thursday, Friday and Saturday.

br.br: From Mr. Eccles, North White School Corporation Superintendent: (4/8/2020)

span.br: The White County Egg Farm will be donating eggs to North White student families for the remainder of the school year. Starting on Monday, April 13th, our students may pick up the eggs at North White Elementary School on Mondays or Thursdays from 6:00-7:00 PM. (While supplies last) (One carton per family)

span.style: font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 18pt; color: #800000;

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 11.25pt; color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-repeat: initial;

span.br: From Ms. Hook, School Corporation Nurse:

strong.span: If your child has prescribed medications at the school that have not been picked up yet please contact me to set up a time to get those. My email address is chook@nwhite.k12.in.us

p.style: margin: 6px 0px 0px; display: inline; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #1c1e21; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; background-color: #ffffff;

margin: 0px 0px 11.25pt; color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-repeat: initial;

strong.span:
North White School Corporation will be CLOSED for the remainder of the year. (directed by the Governor of Indiana.)
UPDATED: eLearning (Remote) Learning Schedule (Beginning Monday, April 6th, 2020):
Mondays: Waiver Day (No eLearning)
Tuesdays: eLearning
Wednesday: eLearning
Thursday: eLearning
Friday: Waiver Day (No eLearning)

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 6px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #1d2129; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; background-color: #ffffff;

span.span: North White Elementary School's Kindergarten Round-Up (originally scheduled to take place on April 13 form 4 to 7 pm and April 14 from 8 to 11 am) is postponed. New dates or a new plan for moving forward will be released when possible.

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 6px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: #1d2129; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; background-color: #ffffff;

strong.style: color: #000000; font-size: 18pt; background-color: inherit; font-family: inherit;

strong.span: The Pantry is for any family who has a child that attends a North White School and that qualifies for Free/Reduced meals. It is for ALL students in grades Pre K-12th grade.
326 N. Market St. Monon, Indiana (Across from Newbold’s).

span.span: April 21st, May 19th, June 16th, July 21st, August 18th, September 15th, October 20th, November 17th & December 15th

span.style: font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt; color: #0000ff;

br.span: If you would like to donate to the North White Family Pantry, make a check payable to North White Family Pantry, send your tax deductible check to the following:

Nicholas Eccles, Superintendent
402 E. Broadway St.
Monon, IN 47959
Voice: 219-253-6618
Fax: 219-253-6488
Office Hours:
School Days: 7:30 a.m.-4:00 p.m.
Non-School Days: 7:30 a.m.-3:30 p.m.

305 E. Broadway St.
Monon, IN 47959
Voice: 219-253-6638
Fax: 219-253-7004

li.div:
Our Mission The North White School Corporation will use all available resources to educate students to reach their potential and become productive citizens in the future.
Vision Developing students who value life long learning
Connect With Us Follow NWSC on Twitter
Like NWSC on FB

div.p: Copyright © document.write(new Date().getFullYear()) North White School Corporation

North White School Corporation is committed to equal opportunity and does not discriminate on the basis of age, race, color, creed, sex, handicapping conditions, or national origin including limited English proficiency, in any employment opportunity. No person is excluded from participation in, denied the benefits of, or otherwise subjected to unlawful discrimination on such basis under any educational program or student activity. For further information, clarification, or complaint (grievance) procedures, please contact the Superintendent’s office (219-253-6618) or the following coordinator:
Ms. Lynette Thrasher, A.D.A. Coordinator (American with Disabilities), Section 504 Coordinator (handicapping conditions), and Title IX Coordinator (gender discrimination)
North White Elementary School, 304 East Broadway St. Monon, IN 47959. Phone 219-253-6663
